content.body: Also, I wanted to float: Would people be interested in doing a brief presentation to TC39 about this in May, outlining the existence of this effort, its rough goals, encouraging participation, and floating the idea that we might standardize it at TC39 if the committee is interested?
(this could be from an "invited expert" with enough lead time)
doing it in source-map-spec would also preserve (some of the) edit history. I ran a script that converted the google doc history into git commits there
